Deep Search Functionality

Experience comprehensive search across all content types in your ITGlue clone. Find information instantly with intelligent matching and contextual results.

Press Q anywhere to open quick search

Multi-Source Search

Searches across sidebar items, page content, organizations, contacts, locations, documents, passwords, configurations, domains, and assets

Real-Time Results

Get instant search suggestions as you type with intelligent caching for fast performance

Advanced Filtering

Filter results by content type, organization, category, date range, and custom criteria

Context-Aware

Automatically switches between global search and organization-specific search based on your current location

Try These Search Examples

Comprehensive Search

Search across all content types simultaneously

"network configuration"
global

Navigation Items Search

Find specific sidebar items and custom pages

"site summary"
organization

Page Content Search

Search within rich text content and custom forms

"emergency contact"
organization

Cross-Organization Search

Find information across multiple organizations

"john smith"
global

Fuzzy Search & Partial Matching

Find results even with typos or partial terms

"netwrk confg"
global
